resources.string: Examine the type of your blood
The possibility of your blood type is・・

※The BMI index is said to be the least sick when men are 22 and women are 21.\n※The higher the degree of obesity, the higher the probability of lifestyle diseases (diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia).

※The Raurel index is about 130 and it is a standard body shape if it is within plus or minus 15, it is standard.\n※When it is plus 30 or more, it is judged to be silky if it is overweight and becomes minus 30 or less.
※It is generally said that 15 to 18 is normal, but it does not necessarily lead to a diagnosis that it is obese immediately because it exceeds.
※Please understand that there is an individual difference the value. It may causes a measurement error.
※In rare cases, it may be born with blood type other than the above combination due to genetic change or various reasons.
※BMR: The amount of energy per unit time required for life support. For adults, 1200 to 1400 kcal / day a day.\n※We calculate basal metabolic rate using Harris · Benedict equation.
